title: Pulling Princes
description: Set in a fictional Eton College, The Pulling Princes series provides a, “deliciously naughty insider’s guide to the midnight feasts, incredibly close friendships & romances of entitled toffs, British aristocratic & royal teenagers.” The books accurate portrayal of the closed world of elite teens in an English boarding school.The books are narrated from the perspective of a fish out of water American, Calypso Kelly who goes from teased outsider- enduring attacks on her by the British tabloids, teasing by the toffs and taunts from the horrible Honey O'Hare’ – before she eventually beats them at their own game and manages to not only charm all the girls but pull the Prince himself!
author: Tyne O'Connell
